Headlines

Welcome to the design system of Lasse Diercks

It's actually living and helping me a lot

Presentations are now really easy to create with these design assets in my backhand

Paragraph

Design systems are a popular tool to create a common design language and a consistent interface in your product. My awesome friend Fabian once said that design systems have to work on a big and small scale so I decided to give it a shot and create a really small living design system for myself. It's the fuel for my homepage and my manifesto

List
  • Helps me to focus on my tasks
  • Proves that design systems work in a small scale
  • Also proves that design is about content and I'm just making up list items here
  • Allows me to experience with new technologies at a low cost
List with big items
  • Helps me actually a lot to understand the whys
  • E.g. If you need guidelines for colors, create them
  • but if your colors are cool you don't actually need guidelines
  • just because everyone else is having some
  • and don't missuse lists like this
